characterDescription: Kazilah is obviously a historical person in The Stormlight Archive. Presumed to be male given 'his' name, 'he' was a member of the Knights Radiant, likely from the time before they disappeared from amongst the population. 'He' is mentioned only in the Epigraph for Words of Radiance: Chapter 51. It seems 'he' turned traitor and was slain for 'his' betrayal.
